data: The air in the Pullman was hot and, despite the mechanical contrivances built into the coach to prevent such a contingency, the dust from the right-of-way persisted in filtering through crevices.
Seltzer, Charles Alden, 1875-1942; Ivory, P. V. E., 1883-1960 [Illustrator]
